promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute strong bison fire-type pokemon with ornate horns. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or bison. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Hornblaze, a a chibi cute strong bison fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Blaze Up. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bison", "fire" or "Hornblaze". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, bison-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This flame-furred, bulky beast known as Hornblaze thrives in volcanic areas. Its ability, Blaze Up, lets its fiery temper spark into powerful, molten fury.
